scripts.clean: rm -rf build .docusaurus src/docs/code-templator-lib src/docs/lib src/docs/template-types-lib src/docs/cli dist temp
scripts.gen:template-types-lib-api: cd ../template-types-lib && bun run build && cd ../docs && mkdir -p src/docs/template-types-lib && api-extractor run -c template-types-lib-api-extractor.json --local --verbose
scripts.gen:code-templator-lib-api: cd ../code-templator-lib && bun run build && cd ../docs && mkdir -p src/docs/code-templator-lib && api-extractor run -c code-templator-lib-api-extractor.json --local --verbose
scripts.gen:cli: cd ../../apps/cli && bun run build:dist && oclif readme --multi --output-dir=../../packages/docs/src/docs/cli && cd ../../packages/docs
scripts.docs: bun run gen:template-types-lib-api && bun run gen:code-templator-lib-api && bun run gen:cli && cp src/extra-pages/cli-index.md src/docs/cli/index.md && docusaurus build
scripts.devdocs: bun run gen:template-types-lib-api && bun run gen:code-templator-lib-api && bun run gen:cli && cp src/extra-pages/cli-index.md src/docs/cli/index.md && docusaurus start --port 3100
